videos.headline: Loy walks into the end zone for the Bowling Green TD
videos.description: Bowling Green quarterback Grant Loy goes up the middle and scores the easy 6-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Loy walks into the end zone for the Bowling Green TD) 2019/11/02
